## Function to Bin the Drivesim data into chunks of equal distance
  The function requires the Bin size otherwise the default will be 100m,


```{r results='hide'}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyselect)
bins <- vector()
bin_by_dist <- function(x, bin_size = 100) {
  if(class(x) != "data.frame") {
      stop("Object is Not Data Frame")
  }
  if(!"Total_dist" %in% names(x)){
      stop("No distance column in data frame");
  }
  print("Check OK")
  max_bin <- if_else(menu(c("Country", "Urban"),T,"Is this a Country or Urban scenario?") == 1, 31000, 9000)
  
  bins <- c(seq(from = 300, to = max_bin,by= bin_size))
  bin_ranges <- 
  print("Starting Binning")
  
  bin_ranges <<- for (a in bins) {
    paste(a,"-", a + bin_size)
  }
 
  
  print("Starting Binning")

  
  print("Binning Complete, Starting Export")
}
```

## Function to Bin the Drivesim data into chunks of equal distance
  The function requires the Bin size otherwise the default will be 100m, 


```{r}

bin_by_dist(Imported)
class(Imported)
```
